com.hortonworks.registries.common.util

Interface FileStorage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HdfsFileStorage, LocalFileSystemStorage

    public interface FileStorage
    Interface abstracting the upload and download of files (like parser jars, split/join or custom processor jars or any other files) for IoTaS. IoTaS will provide a default file system based implementation which can be swapped by another implementation using fileStorageConfiguration property in the iotas.yaml

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_DIR 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean deleteFile(String name)
      Deletes the stored file for given name.
      InputStream downloadFile(String name)
      Returns InputStream of file for the given name.
      void init(Map<String,String> config)
      The file storage can be initialized with a set of key/value pairs.
      String uploadFile(InputStream inputStream, String name)
      Uploads the content from given InputStream to the configured storage with the given name as identifier which can be used later for downloadFile(String) or deleteFile(String).

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_DIR

        static final String DEFAULT_DIR
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(Map<String,String> config)
        The file storage can be initialized with a set of key/value pairs.
        Parameters:
        config - the config specific to implementation

      • uploadFile

        String uploadFile(InputStream inputStream,
                  String name)
           throws IOException
        Uploads the content from given InputStream to the configured storage with the given name as identifier which can be used later for downloadFile(String) or deleteFile(String).
        Parameters:
        inputStream - stream to read the file content from
        name - identifier of the file to be used later to retrieve using downloadFile(String)
        Throws:
        IOException - if any IO error occurs

      • downloadFile

        InputStream downloadFile(String name)
                  throws IOException
        Returns InputStream of file for the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - identifier of the file to be downloaded that was first passed during uploadFile(InputStream, String)
        Returns:
        InputStream representing the file
        Throws:
        IOException - if any IO error occurs

      • deleteFile

        boolean deleteFile(String name)
            throws IOException
        Deletes the stored file for given name.
        Parameters:
        name - identifier of the file to be deleted that was passed during uploadFile(InputStream, String)
        Returns:
        true if the file is deleted, false if the file could not be deleted
        Throws:
        IOException - if any IO error occurs
